title: Battle of the Black Gate: This Day We Fight! - Third Age Total War Mod Gameplay
description:
BATTLE STARTS: 5:34
This is the continuation of our 300k Special. We saw the epic siege for Minas Tirith, but now we are at the Black Gate.  The Men of the west must buy time for Frodo!  Will the age of men die here, or will Sauron be defeated?  Enjoy the Battle :D 

Minas Tirith Siege: https://www.youtube.com/edit?o=U&video_id=za0dtkLp-V8

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
